name: Hack & Slay - your little Farm
description:
A submission for the weekly game jam 138.

Note: Due to a two day long illness, I couldn't make this game as amazing as I wanted it to be and most plants have invisible effects, there is no sound, etc. :( After the jam is completely finished, I will complete this game.

Use your hack to plant some magical plants during the day, and use it to slay some slimes at night because they want to destroy your house. Why they want to do that? I don't know how slimes think.........

The plants have different effects on the enemies, but only the fireballplants' effect is visible. 

The goal is to survive as long as possible.
